ai-ja473:1.2_0: How do we get rid of the sensible people?
ai-ja473:1.4_0: Having seen (that), an astute person is intelligent.”
ai-ja473:3.2_0: You don’t associate with your friends,
ai-ja473:4.1_0: They tell you their secrets, (but) you must tell you,
ai-ja473:5.1_0: He takes joy in your loss,
ai-ja473:5.2_0: you take no delight in your success.
ai-ja473:5.6_0: he became one with the intention.
ai-ja473:6.1_0: These are the sixteen conditions that are wrong.
ai-ja473:6.2_0: it’s established in the next world:
ai-ja473:6.3_0: Those who know it by means I will know.
ai-ja473:6.4_0: Having seen (that), an astute person is intelligent.”
ai-ja473:7.2_0: How do we get rid of the sensible people?
ai-ja473:7.3_0: The wise will know, who is intelligent,
ai-ja473:7.4_0: When they see him, the astute
ai-ja473:8.1_0: and the huge of his hermitage,
ai-ja473:8.3_0: Therefore he has fondness (for you) and welcomes you with (kindly) words.
ai-ja473:9.1_0: you’ll keep company with your friends.
ai-ja473:9.4_0: praise by the praise of the great hermit;
ai-ja473:10.2_0: His secret he tells to you,
ai-ja473:10.3_0: you commend your throat, you’re praised.
ai-ja473:11.1_0: you take joy in your success,
ai-ja473:11.5_0: And they have compassion for one,
ai-ja473:11.6_0: he became one with the intention.
ai-ja473:12.1_0: These are the sixteen conditions that are wrong.
ai-ja473:12.3_0: Those who have a friend should know,
ai-ja473:12.4_0: Having seen and heard about this, an astute person is intelligent.”
ai-ja473:14.1_0: The Book of the Twelves is finished.
